verses.verse: And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may hold a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto me in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that I should <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> to let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, neither will I let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> hath <S%H7122>met<s%> with us: let us <S%H3212>go<s%>, we pray thee, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>desert<s%>, and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; lest he <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon us with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, or with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Wherefore do ye, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H6544>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from their <S%H4639>works<s%>? <S%H3212>get<s%> you unto your <S%H5450>burdens<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> now are <S%H7227>many<s%>, and ye make them <S%H7673>rest<s%> from their <S%H5450>burdens<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and their <S%H7860>officers<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Ye shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> to <S%H3835>make<s%> <S%H3843>brick<s%>, as <S%H8032%H8543>heretofore<s%>: let them <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> for themselves.

And the <S%H4971>tale<s%> of the <S%H3843>bricks<s%>, which they did <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8032%H8543>heretofore<s%>, ye shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> upon them; ye shall not <S%H1639>diminish<s%> ought thereof: for they be <S%H7503>idle<s%>; therefore they <S%H6817>cry<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to our <S%H430>God<s%>.
Let there more <S%H5656>work<s%> be <S%H3513>laid<s%> upon the <S%H582>men<s%>, that they may <S%H6213>labour<s%> therein; and let them not <S%H8159>regard<s%> <S%H8267>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and their <S%H7860>officers<s%>, and they <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8401>straw<s%>.

<S%H3212>Go<s%> ye, <S%H3947>get<s%> you <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> ye can <S%H4672>find<s%> it: <S%H3588>yet<s%> not <S%H1697>ought<s%> of your <S%H5656>work<s%> shall be <S%H1639>diminished<s%>.
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> instead of <S%H8401>straw<s%>.

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> <S%H213>hasted<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3615>Fulfil<s%> your <S%H4639>works<s%>, your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>tasks<s%>, as when there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> had <S%H7760>set<s%> over them, were <S%H5221>beaten<s%>, and <S%H559>demanded<s%>, Wherefore have ye not <S%H3615>fulfilled<s%> your <S%H2706>task<s%> in making <S%H3835>brick<s%> both <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> and to <S%H3117>day<s%>, as <S%H8032%H8543>heretofore<s%>?

¶ Then the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wherefore <S%H6213>dealest<s%> thou thus with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>?

There is no <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and they <S%H559>say<s%> to us, <S%H6213>Make<s%> <S%H3843>brick<s%>: and, behold, thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H5221>beaten<s%>; but the <S%H2398>fault<s%> is in thine own <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But he <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye are <S%H7503>idle<s%>, ye are <S%H7503>idle<s%>: therefore ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
<S%H3212>Go<s%> therefore now, and <S%H5647>work<s%>; for there shall no <S%H8401>straw<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> you, yet shall ye <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H8506>tale<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> that they were in <S%H7451>evil<s%> case, after it was <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye shall not <S%H1639>minish<s%> ought from your <S%H3843>bricks<s%> of your <S%H3117%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>task<s%>.
¶ And they <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, who <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H7125>way<s%>, as they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>:

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> upon you, and <S%H8199>judge<s%>; because ye have made our <S%H7381>savour<s%> to be <S%H887>abhorred<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, to <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> us.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, wherefore hast thou so evil <S%H7489>entreated<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>? why is it that thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> me?

For since I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, he hath done <S%H7489>evil<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%>; neither hast thou <S%H5337>delivered<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5337>all<s%>.
